Class CcddLinkHandler

extends java.lang.Object
    CFS Command and Data Dictionary link handler class

      • getLinkNamesByRate

        protected java.util.List<java.lang.String> getLinkNamesByRate(java.lang.String rateName)
        Get the link names for the specified rate column name
        Parameters:
        rateName - rate column name
        Returns:
        List containing the link names for the specified rate column name; an empty list if there are no links associated with the rate

      • getLinkDefinitionsByName

        Parameters:

        linkRate - link rate name
        Returns:

      • getVariableLinks

        protected java.lang.String[][] getVariableLinks(java.lang.String variable,
                                                boolean useDataStream)
        Return an array of rate and link names to which the specified variable belongs
        Parameters:
        variable - variable path and name
        useDataStream - true to return the data stream name in place of the rate column name
        Returns:
        Array containing the rates and links to which the specified variable is a member; an empty array if the variable does not belong to a link

      • getVariableLink

        protected java.lang.String getVariableLink(java.lang.String variable,
                                           java.lang.String rateName)
        Return the link name to which the specified variable belongs for the specified rate
        Parameters:
        variable - variable path and name
        rateName - rate name
        Returns:
        Name of the link if the variable and rate match; null if no match exists

      • getLinkSizeInBytes

        protected int getLinkSizeInBytes(java.lang.String rateName,
                                 java.lang.String name)
        Calculate the number of bytes represented by this link by totaling the size of each variable member
        Parameters:
        rateName - data stream rate column name
        name - name of the link to calculate the remaining bytes for
        Returns:
        Number of bytes used in the link; 0 if no variables are in the link

      • getLinkDescription

        protected java.lang.String getLinkDescription(java.lang.String rateName,
                                              java.lang.String name)
        Get the description for a specified link
        Parameters:
        rateName - data stream rate column name
        name - link name
        Returns:
        Description of the specified link; returns a blank if the link doesn't exist

      • getLinkRate

        protected java.lang.String getLinkRate(java.lang.String rateName,
                                       java.lang.String name)
        Get the link rate
        Parameters:
        rateName - data stream rate column name
        name - name of the link
        Returns:
        Link rate; blank if the link name doesn't exist

      • getApplicationNames

        protected java.lang.String[] getApplicationNames(java.lang.String applicationFieldName)
        Get the application name data field values associated with the specified link's variable members
        Parameters:
        applicationFieldName - name of the application name data field
        Returns:
        Array containing the application name data field values associated with the specified link's variable members. Each application name is listed only once in the array

      • removeInvalidLinks

        private void removeInvalidLinks()
        Check that the variables referenced in the link definitions exist in the data tables. Remove any invalid link definitions
